original_title: Wan Xia: La última luz del atardecer
overview: Fundation of the Republic and Small Law are two Chinese elders who frequent the center of Chinese majors of Usera, in Madrid. During the preparations for the Chinese New Year, one of the elders dies and a series of electrical problems begin to happen in the club that threaten to spoil the party.
title: Wan Xia: The Last Light of the Sunset
